content: Yes, there are a few spots on the Road to Hana where you can witness a beautiful sunset. One of the most popular is at the Waianapanapa State Park, which is located at the end of the Road to Hana. The black sand beach and the crashing waves of the Pacific Ocean make for a breathtaking sunset view. Another spot is at Koki Beach, which has a wide expanse of golden sand, and a backdrop of tall palm trees that turn golden in the light of the setting sun. The Keanae Peninsula is another spot where you can enjoy a stunning sunset while overlooking the Pacific Ocean.
